data.PDL:: seems to be a better root namescape than Prima::, since from
data.description: Convert PDL scalars to Prima images
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
PDL:: seems to be a better root namescape than Prima::, since from
    point of view of a PDL user, Prima is a visualisation option, and
    fills some void between GL and Tk.
